document.title: Dvin
header.title: Dvin Avanesian
about.main: I'm Dvin, web designer and developer, born in 2004, and currently living in Esfahan, Iran. I develop full-stack web applications with Javascript. I always try to do the best I can because I hate my work to be criticized by others! I usually pay attention to the smallest details and one of the things I care about the most is being organized. The more organized the work, the less the problems!
